snippet: President François Hollande’s call to raise the tax rate on France’s wealthiest citizens to 75 percent has some considering a move to Brussels or London.
abstract: Proposal by French Pres Francois Holland to raise the tax rate on France's wealthiest citizens to 75 percent has some big earners considering leaving the country.
lead_paragraph: President François Hollande’s call to raise the tax rate on France’s wealthiest citizens to 75 percent has some considering a move to Brussels or London.

headline.seo: ‘Les Riches’ in France Vow to Leave if 75% Tax Rate Is Passed
headline.main: Indigestion for ‘les Riches’ in a Plan for Higher Taxes
